Platformer.description: Games that involve guiding a character through levels using jumping and climbing to overcome obstacles.

Action RPG.description: Role-playing games that emphasize real-time combat and inventory-based character progression.
examples: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

Turn-Based RPG.description: Role-playing games with combat systems that allow players and enemies to take turns.

Metroidvania.description: Exploration-based 2D platformers featuring ability-gated progression and interconnected worlds.

Adventure.description: Games focused on story-driven exploration and puzzle-solving.
